mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_DUR투여기간주의기본 조회 (DurDosageMapper.getDurDosage) */ SELECT dosage_prd_cutn_sn ,mdcn_cd ,mdcn_nm ,gnrl_nm_cd ,gnrl_nm ,max_dosage_prd_days ,mfds_prdct_nm ,mfds_igrd_cd ,mfds_igrd_nm ,pbanc_ymd ,pbanc_no ,aplcn_ym ,rmrk ,type_cd ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_DOSAGE" WHERE 1=1 AND dosage_prd_cutn_sn = #{dosagePrdCutnSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_DUR투여기간주의기본 수정 (DurDosageMapper.updateDurDosage) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_DOSAGE" SET mdcn_cd = coalesce(#{mdcnCd}, mdcn_cd) ,mdcn_nm = coalesce(#{mdcnNm}, mdcn_nm) ,gnrl_nm_cd = coalesce(#{gnrlNmCd}, gnrl_nm_cd) ,gnrl_nm = coalesce(#{gnrlNm}, gnrl_nm) ,max_dosage_prd_days = coalesce(#{maxDosagePrdDays}, max_dosage_prd_days) ,mfds_prdct_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsPrdctNm}, mfds_prdct_nm) ,mfds_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdCd}, mfds_igrd_cd) ,mfds_igrd_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdNm}, mfds_igrd_nm) ,pbanc_ymd = coalesce(#{pbancYmd}, pbanc_ymd) ,pbanc_no = coalesce(#{pbancNo}, pbanc_no) ,aplcn_ym = coalesce(#{aplcnYm}, aplcn_ym) ,rmrk = coalesce(#{rmrk}, rmrk) ,type_cd = coalesce(#{typeCd}, type_cd) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND dosage_prd_cutn_sn = #{dosagePrdCutnSn}
